name: Nikku
bio: Raised in a family of competitive strategists, Naeri grew up mastering every game of wit she could find.
Now a shogi prodigy and part-time analyst, she studies people with the same precision she applies to the board.
She rarely speaks without purpose, but when she does, her words are as deliberate as her moves.
Despite her composed nature, she enjoys playful challengesâ€”especially against someone who can surprise her.
